projectInfo.title: Andarikosam
projectInfo.summary: Overseas Charitable Foundation Logo reflecting their NPO qualities
projectInfo.introduction: Recently started charitable foundation based in Andhra Pradesh/Telangana, India. Founded by a group of '85-'89 ECE (Electronics and Communication Engineering) graduates of the Bapatla Engineering College, the organization aims to help the impoverished, from education to basic needs. "Andarikosam" is a Telugu (Central-Southern Indian language) term and translates into English as "for everybody". The logo represents growth, peace, and a helping hand. By incorporating Telugu into the logo, the organization is staying true to its roots while simultaneously appealing to its target audience.

content.rendered: Recently started charitable foundation based in Andhra Pradesh/Telangana, India. Founded by a group of ’85-’89 ECE (Electronics and Communication Engineering) graduates of the Bapatla Engineering College, the organization aims to help the impoverished, from education to basic needs. “Andarikosam” is a Telugu (Central-Southern Indian language) term and translates into English as “for everybody”. The logo represents growth, peace, and a helping hand. By incorporating Telugu into the logo, the organization is staying true to its roots while simultaneously appealing to its target audience.
